markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 12"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Ring of Climbing](/Equipment.aspx?ID=3103)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Invested" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=637" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=644" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [GM Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=218) pg. 294 <sup>2.0</sup>

**Price** 1,750 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** worn

</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

Claw-like prongs on this thick golden band bears extend to dig deep into sheer surfaces when you are Climbing. This ring grants you a climb Speed equal to half your land Speed. Penalties to your Speed (including those from your armor) apply before halving. 

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
name: Ring of Climbing
